item.title: Uninstall Docker on Ubuntu 24.04: Complete Clean Removal
item.description: Need to remove Docker from Ubuntu 24.04 (Noble) cleanly? This guide shows a safe, step‑by‑step removal that gets rid of the Engine, Compose v2 plugin, configs, and data — plus optional rootless Docker cleanup. If you plan to reinstall after this, see: Install Docker on Ubuntu 24.04: Post‑Install, Rootless, and Compose v2 . For HTTPS and reverse proxy, see: Nginx + Certbot on Ubuntu 24.04: Free HTTPS with Let’s Encrypt .
